column1: Smoque BBQ////Room for improvement?  The meat was cooked to perfection
column2: but the sauce wasn't very memorable.  And like countless other bbq places
column3: Smoque would do well to put some more effort into their bread/buns.  Some average bread won't spoil the meat here
column4: but the right kind will make it divine.  Cooper's is a good example of a place that has embraced this concept.
